tool_description: Get current year's U.S. stock market holidays
name: stock market holidays
title: stock market holidays

api_list.name: GET Remaining Stock Market holidays of the year
api_list.description: It returns the remaining holidays of the current stock market year
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-market-holidays.p.rapidapi.com/remaining"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-market-holidays.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get USA Stock Market Holidays of current year
api_list.description: Returns this year's stock market holidays and the open status of the NASDAQ and NYSE Exchanges
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-market-holidays.p.rapidapi.com/holidays"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-market-holidays.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
